snippet.title: Mount & Blade: Warband - Viking Conquest Reforged Edition [Launch Trailer]
snippet.description:
Launch trailer for Viking Conquest Reforged Edition, a free major expansion to the DLC!

Release: July 2015
Buy now: https://www.taleworlds.com/en/Games/VikingConquest

Other Retailers:
TaleWorlds Web Store - https://www.taleworlds.com/en/Games/VikingConquest
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/321300/
GOG - http://www.gog.com/game/mount_blade_warband_viking_conquest
Gamersgate - http://www.gamersgate.com/DLC-MBWVC/mount-and-blade-warband-viking-conquest
Humble Store - https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/mountandblade_warband_viking_storefront
Nuuvem - http://www.nuuvem.com.br/produto/2487-mount-blade-warband-viking-conquest

Like us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/mountandblade
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/Mount_and_Blade
